section.heading: Scope.
section.text: This chapter governs licensees or those who are applying for licensure or registration by the Board.

section.heading: Fees for Massage Therapy Licensure and Registration.
section.text: The following fees are established by the Board and are non-refundable:

para.text: Late renewal fee (within 30 days of license or registration expiration, in addition to renewal fee) . . . $200;
Reinstatement fee (after 31 days of expiration of license or registration, inclusive of a reinstatement fee, renewal fee, and late fee) . . . $475;
Reactivation fee (inclusive of a reactivation fee and renewal fee) . . . $350;
Duplicate license or registration ordered at renewal . . . $20;
Penalty for failure to maintain correct name or address with the Board . . . $100;
Continuing Education Course processing fee per submission . . . $40;
Paper copy of laws and regulations . . . $40.
Fees are nonrefundable with the exception of the examination fee.
The examination fee may be refunded at the discretion of the Board if the applicant’s written request is received by registered mail at least 14 days before the examination.

annotations.annotation: Health Occupations Article, §§6-206 and 6-207, Annotated Code of Maryland

Regulation .02 amended effective December 25, 2023 (50:25 Md. R. 1088)
Regulation .03 repealed and Regulation .04 recodified to be Regulation .03 effective December 25, 2023 (50:25 Md. R. 1088)
